typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		sourcedId as integer,
		name as string,
		type as string,
		parentSourcedId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> source1
source(output(
		sourcedId as integer,
		name as string,
		type as string,
		parentSourcedId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> source2
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		sourcedId as string,
		name as string,
		type as string,
		parentSourcedId as string
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
